website_summaries.verdict: Golfers much welcome the latest addition to the BIOM family embodied by the Hybrid 3 GTX. It provides all the necessary requirements of golfers and more. It is built with comfortable, stable, and supportive elements. What seals the deal is the luxurious yak leather upper and GTX, which are excellent additions that elevate the look and function of this Ecco golf shoe.
pros: The majority of the reviewers of the Ecco BIOM Hybrid 3 GTX compliments the extreme shoe comfort
A lot of consumers gush about this high-quality and outstanding product
The high ratings and the hype are justifiable
Pleased with the performance of this trainer, several find themselves as repeat customers of Ecco shoes
The Gore-Tex feature lives up to its promise of keeping the shoe extremely waterproof
A couple of wearers feel indulgent because of the yak leather upper
The BIOM Hybrid 3 GTX passes the peculiar taste of fashion-conscious golfers
It looks like dress sneakers, so pairing them with jeans, dockers, and shorts is not a problem
Plenty of players are impressed with the support, stability, and flexibility that these provide throughout the entire game
Some individuals report that they are guilty of wearing these off the course and loving it
cons: One feels disappointed that the shoe leaves water stains after only the first round of golf
An expert reviewer notes that the $200 price point may be expensive for many, especially when compared to other brands

customer_reviews.title: A most excellent golf shoe.
customer_reviews.text: A lovely shoe, excellent quality. I've had them for several months and have put them through dozen rounds of golf, at least. Very comfortable and suitable for a long day of walking the course. The soles don't offer as much grip as a spike, but are great because they are almost self clearing. Only on the wettest days do I have to clean any dirt and debris from the sole. And they're good on a variety of surfaces, safe for carpet, tile, wood, etc. And speaking of the wettest days, the shoes keep my feet perfectly dry. And the leather has held up very well from multiple soakings. Couldn't be happier with these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Boxley

customer_reviews.title: Do not deceive customers. It will eventually come back to bite you.......
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and fit of this shoe. I also another pair of Ecco golf shoes. What upset me was its a returned pair. I paid full price for a new pair. Some of the lugs are already abraded. There is dried up turf/grass in the outsole. Always regarded Ecco as a quality brand. Absolutely disappointed. What were they thinking? Or was it Amazon who did this to save a few bucks for the company. I have worked as a chemist and technician in the footwear industry for several decades.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable, I bought another pair
customer_reviews.text: After reading how comfortable ECCO golf shoes were, I bit the bullet and made a purchase on another site. The shoes were so comfortable and offered such great support that I bought another pair. I love being able to wear them from the house to the first tee. The leather is soft and the insoles are supportive. Recently, I played 36 holes with one of my sons and I couldn't believe how I didn't have that worn out feeling when I wore my Adidas 360s. I've worn them in wet conditions and they held up well. The quality build is unmatched. Excellent job, ECCO!
customer_reviews.author: Carl A. Hargrove

customer_reviews.title: Husband approves! Best birthday gift ever
customer_reviews.text: It’s the best golf shoes ever! My husband love them so much! It’s really comfortable. You need to order a size down because it comes really big we had to return it for a small size my husband wear size 9 but we had to get size 7 because it was seriously large but other than that it’s the best shoe he said he ever wore
customer_reviews.author: faraha

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoes ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable comfort. I usually don’t spend this much on golf shoes, but I was in a big box golf store and tried on 12 different brands and styles of shoes. Then I decided to try on these Ecco’s to see what all the hype was. Now I am a believer! Most comfortable shoes I’ve ever owned. Give em a try. If you have a wide foot, there is a removable extra footbed to give you extra room. I usually wear EE width, but these fit perfect even with both foot beds in. I found these in Amazon and saved $60 vs. big box!
customer_reviews.author: James Tedesco

customer_reviews.title: Ecco comfort, runs a 1/2 size smaller compared to the G2 GTX.
customer_reviews.text: Felt great right out of the box. Can't wait to get these on the golf course. Sizing note: I have worn size 43 in Ecco Bioms and G2 GTXs the past few seasons, but needed a 44 in these.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Fish

customer_reviews.title: Pricey
customer_reviews.text: I waited until I had worn these shoes several times before I wrote this review. I really wanted to like these shoes because the reviews were so high and I have other shoes of this brand and am pleased with them. These shoes are comfortable but the leather is so soft and thin that when you walk they make a popping sound when the toes of the shoes flex. This is very annoying. I was hoping with wear this would go away but they are still popping. Also they are constantly coming untied which is also annoying. Disappointed with these shoes that I paid close to 200.00 for.
customer_reviews.author: charles hardwick

customer_reviews.title: Dry and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband. He golfs for the fun of it.. Never keeping score. But, he always came home with wet feet and some what hurting because he always had used his old work shoes. We got these as a "just because" gift.. Nothing special. He came home after his first time out golfing this year and was just raving how much keeping his feet dry and comfortable helped him play and enjoy the game more. He told me that the shoes felt broken in and was the only reason he used his old work shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa J Cota

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable from 1st tee to 19th hole!
customer_reviews.text: Love. These. Shoes! I've owned several different golf shoes over the years. Fit and comfortable always an issue. As I own Ecco street shoes and love their comfort, figured I'd try their golf shoes. Comfort out of the box. Good traction for spikeless shoe. And stylish and comfortable enough to wear from course to clubhouse. I'm putting out all my other shoes. Thanks, Ecco, for another great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money and time.
customer_reviews.text: I play golf once a week, year round. I walk unless absolutely forced to ride. I bought these Eccos because I have fallen in love with their dress shoes. I have not been disappointed after the first 3 weeks. I have a wide foot and a high arch. These work for both issues. I have always been worried about traction from a spikeless golf shoe. Wet or dry, the Biom Hybrid stands up to the job. The seller initially sent the wrong color but worked with me to correct the problem in a few days. I was very impressed with their attention and problem resolution. I cannot foresee purchasing any other golf shoe than Eccos going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the shoe. I wear a 10.5 wide (ordered 10-10.5) and was happy to see these are wide! They are comfortable but with being waterproof, don’t breath as well as other shoes. Just the nature of being waterproof. I have played 3 rounds so far (temps in high 90’s) and was glad to get them off after the round. They kept feet dry during the morning dew which was great! Grip was great and felt anchored while swinging. Hope they last a long time. You won’t be disappointed with fit and function.
customer_reviews.author: John Rossi

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am just starting to play golf, but bad shoes wreak havoc with my back. I therefore decided to buy these as Ecco’s have always been very comfortable for me. They run just a bit larger than other Ecco’s that I own. Overall I am thrilled with the fit and feel and they are perfect for walking 18 holes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Because I needed to replace mine old pair, I carefully checked reviews for golf shoes. These shoes are exceptionally comfortable. They do run just a touch wide, but I knew this and it was fine with me becuase that is what I was looking for. After walking four rounds with them over the past two weeks, I am quite happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: klornell

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe.
customer_reviews.text: What can you say that has not already been said about these shoes. Fit is great. The leather is so soft with little breaking in needed. Ecco is the leader in golf shoes. Best part is I can put them on at home and drive to the course and walk right out without doing the shoe swap in the parking lot.
customer_reviews.author: Mario J Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Best golf shoes I've found-Cleats could be more durable
customer_reviews.text: I walk the course, usually two or three times a week. These shoes are stable, comfortable, light, and dry, the best golf shoes for walking I've ever owned, by far. They are well made. I bought them in black. They're dressy enough for casual street wear and travel. Casual wear wasn't my original intent, but they're so comfortable and good-looking, I've started wearing them almost everywhere. My only criticism is that after one year the cleats are totally wearing down. I bought another pair solely for golf course use.
customer_reviews.author: mains01

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size. Fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.text: Love Ecco golf shoes. Normally I wear a 44 but the site only let me choose size 10 or 11 which kind of bookend this EU size. I ordered 11 and they are way too big. So I returned for the 10. Fingers crossed because the price is very good for this shoe. We’ll find out Monday.
customer_reviews.author: Kem

customer_reviews.title: Do your feet a favor!
customer_reviews.text: These golf shoes felt comfortable the first time I put them on. I bought my exact size and it's perfect. I haven't worn them in any wet conditions yet but the quality of this product is such that I'm sure I'll be pleased with them. After I've used them more I'll probably come back and raise the star rating to 5. All good so far.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Dee

customer_reviews.title: Misleading product description!
customer_reviews.text: It was not disclosed in product description that these were not standard ECCO size 44 shoes but in fact we’re “Extra Width” and thus were uncomfortably wide. Will steer clear of Ecco shoes on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Comfortable, Durable Construction...
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable golf shoes I have ever purchased. I was worried about spending $199 on a pair of golf shoes, because I know how much punishment they take out on the course, especially when it's wet/muddy. After six rounds of golf, they still look brand new! No issues with traction so far...
customer_reviews.author: sparkyf15

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable but beware misleading
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and extremely comfortable. However, despite extensive research on the sizing, I had to return as they fit 2 sizes smaller than I typically wear. Luxury golf shoe at premium price, but after several rounds, they appear to be more comfortable, flexible, and breath better than my trusty DryJoys.
customer_reviews.author: P. McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Great Golf Shoe. High Quality and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This Is my second pair of ECCO Biom Hybrid 3 golf shoes. They are comfortable and supportive and better than any FootJoy golf shoe I have ever owned. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: DoubleNicks

customer_reviews.title: Slightly Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is my fifth pair of ECCOs and my second pair of this exact style. First thing, the right shoe leaked water first time I wore them. This has never happened in ten years of wearing ECCOs with some being 7 years old and still watertight. Maybe just a defect? Secondly, these were significantly wider than the other ECCO size 45 shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Louie

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I've had a few pairs of golf shoes over the years and none have come close to what these offer. I walk a 9 to 18 at least once a week and I dont have to worry about the back my heel getting blistered when wearing short socks. Great shoe, would recommend to anyone willing to fork over a few more dollars for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Rennie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Golf Shoe
customer_reviews.text: This golf shoe continues the tradition of comfort that I have experienced with my previous Echo golf shoes. These spike-less pattern underneath gives excellent support on a wet, muddy turf.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kirkes

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I own several pairs of Ecco golf shoes, casual shoes and dress shoes. These are my favorite, especially for golf. Very, very comfortable and stylish. My wife commented that they don't look dorky like most golf shoes. The leather is soft and supple. I occasionally wear them to work with jeans. I have two pairs, the grey and white with black. On course traction is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Craighead

customer_reviews.title: Be careful in sizing
customer_reviews.text: Seller only had size 44 available, while I am a size 43. They fit ok, but a little large. Shoe quality is excellent, but for some reason my game didn't improve !
customer_reviews.author: philip pedersen

customer_reviews.title: Best ECCOS Yet.
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth pair of ECCOS and the best ever. The sole is amazing. I play on a course that has been very wet with all the rains we have had and the sole stays perfectly clean. My partners are all ordering them.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Looks horrible
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 2 pairs but different sizes but the second pair didn't look the same, looks used but we paid for new and it came in a different box not an Ecco box!!;
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Southern

customer_reviews.title: Great arch support
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are comfortable and at the same time very supportive. They alleviate the problems Inhad with my ankle from less well structured shoes
customer_reviews.author: Buyer1950

customer_reviews.title: excellent comphy shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these shoes. Ecco shoes are very comfortable and these do not disappoint. The tread is very grippy on teh course (even when wet) and I can walk 36 in these.
customer_reviews.author: golfer

customer_reviews.title: These Gore Tex Shoes Leak--Stay Away
customer_reviews.text: These Gore Tex golf shoes leak. My socks have been wet after two different rounds this spring and no, the water is not coming from the top. Yes, it's been wet. However, I've only have the shoes for two months. It will only get worse. This combined with the shoes running a half size big have me very disappointed. The only compliment I have is that they look nice.
customer_reviews.author: D. Plachta

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Item came quickly. Husband loves ECCO golf shoes, says they are the most comfortable golf shoe he has owned. He has three pair. The only reason I took a star off is because we received an extra wide pair and there was no indication on the description that they were extra wide. He says they still fit, but just a little roomy.
customer_reviews.author: mrs. trobridge

customer_reviews.title: The best shoes I’ve ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best golf shoes I’ve ever owned. If I could give 6 out of 5 stars I would. Very comfy and they look great!
customer_reviews.author: Brent T Henning

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes. A little tight width-wise based on all ...
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes. A little tight width-wise based on all my other golf shoes. By half a size maybe. If they do half sizes, I'd recommend that. Even a little more length would be good.
customer_reviews.author: T. Beaulieu

customer_reviews.title: Walk in style.
customer_reviews.text: If you walk when you play, these are the best for your feet. The sole grips well, without collecting dirt.
customer_reviews.author: magic swan

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but euro sizing may be a problem
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is excellent. Solved my sore ankle problem. However sizing conversion was off. The euro size 41 was a size 8 instead of the 42 on the conversion chart. Had this problem with other models. Size conversion chart was different in other stores I checked.
customer_reviews.author: ed o

customer_reviews.title: Comfort, quality and style.
customer_reviews.text: Comfort, style and quality come to mind when I think about these shoes. This is my sixth pair of Ecco golf shoes. Doe now I wear these when I’m not playing golf.
customer_reviews.author: Roland

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable Golf Shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made comfortable golf shoe that I would not hesitate to recommend. The toe box is nice and wide giving those with wider feet extra room. They run just a bit large.
customer_reviews.author: DSWAN

customer_reviews.title: Not a great walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable enough, and they do keep your feet dry against the morning dew. However, the back edge of the shoe - the part which comes in contact with the achilles tendon - is stiff and most probably will blister your heel if you walk a hilly course in these shoes. OK for cart golf.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Duffy

customer_reviews.title: I can’t believe how comfortable this shoe is
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these golf shoes. They are incredibly comfortable, and from the first time I put them on I knew they would become my favorite golf shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had tried Ecco long ago!
customer_reviews.text: The leather is like butter. Very good arch support. These are by far the most comfortable golf shoes right out of the box that I have ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Bunker Master

customer_reviews.title: Rugged Golf Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Waterproof... Good stability... Great traction during swing...Light...Soft insoles...Comfortable out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky, Aquia Va.

customer_reviews.title: These are great shoes. I wore an older ECCO model for ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes. I wore an older ECCO model for at least 4 years, and they held up incredibly well. They had just started to lose the ability to keep water out, so it was necessary to get a new pair. I never entertained the idea of going to another manufacturer, because my old shoes were so good, in every way. This model, the Biom Hybrid 3, with Gore Tex, may be even better.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Ecco golf shoes are some of the best.
customer_reviews.text: Ecco shoes are very comfortable and long wearing. Shoes fit as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great golf shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and is water resistant. Best golf shoe brand on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Aceves

customer_reviews.title: Comfort out the box. Can’t go wrong.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Ecco golf shoes for years since this Dr put a needle in the ball of my foot and told me to get rid of spikes. This Hybrid 3 Gortex fits a little different than the 2 but great feel and comfort. I have several pair that I switch out each play and they last a long time. Yes a little pricy but have never had another foot problem.
customer_reviews.author: David Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking and buy these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable golf shoes ever. Sturdy and stable base for golfing and they feel as comfy slippers. Played 45 holes on a recent Saturday and feet were the only thing not sore at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: PhilJ

customer_reviews.title: Work and comfotable
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and as described. Comfortable. Pretty good grip. Like em.
customer_reviews.author: tammer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes Awesome Look Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: My Golfing friends all commented on the shoes--they look fantastic- Best part is i Have BAD Feet and these are wonderfully comfortable Great Buy Thanks Again!
customer_reviews.author: Jlovegolf

customer_reviews.title: Garbage. Water stains after one round wouldn’t come out
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Water stains after one round wouldn’t come out. Ruined on first round.
customer_reviews.author: SueFish

customer_reviews.title: No other golf shoe matches this one!
customer_reviews.text: Great golf shoe. Comfortable, water proof, no cleats to replace, and Ecco makes the best long lasting shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Byron

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe- Careful with size when you order.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. I ordered 1 size larger based on a prior purchase of the Ecco golf shoe with GoreTex lining. One size larger than other Ecco golf shoes works out great.
customer_reviews.author: Jack-O

customer_reviews.title: Best golf shoe I have
customer_reviews.text: Best golf shoe I have ever worn after 20 Years of playing golf. This is my second pair
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for🤙
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful Golf shoe! Quality materials used throughout the shoe. Thank you ECCO👌👏🤩
customer_reviews.author: Hi.59

customer_reviews.title: A++ for Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable. Feels like golfing in bedroom slippers. I’ve been playing golf for 30 years, and these are the most comfortable golf shoes I’ve ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: papa red

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable golf shoe I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Roger L. Miles

customer_reviews.title: Fit and Feel
customer_reviews.text: For a person with wide feet, this shoe fits perfectly. It is like wearing a regular tennis shoe. I have no issue with slippage, even in cold/wet conditions of Wisconsin. The only real drawback is the price, but if you want a great golf show, it is well worth the extra few dollars!
customer_reviews.author: adeten01

customer_reviews.title: Great golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of this model Ecco golf shoe that I have purchased. They are great. Give good support and traction but are light and comfortable to walk 18 holes.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. William H. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for orthotics!
customer_reviews.text: Easily fit for my orthotics, just added an air pillow insole for an extra cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Ellsworth

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great golf shoes a must buy if you want shoes that last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T. Archambeault

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable golf shoe that I have ever worn
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable golf shoe that I have ever worn. I have tarsal tunnel and plantar fasciitis and with these shoes I can wear them all day. Just as comfortable as my tennis shoes
customer_reviews.author: James V.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for golfing
customer_reviews.text: 2nd pair I have bought. Most comfortable shoe especially for walking.
customer_reviews.author: TPR

customer_reviews.title: One of the most comfortable golf shoes on the market!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is excellent. The Yak leather is so soft and the spineless sole gives you great grip around the course. I love this shoe so much I bought a white and black pair. Better than my Nike golf shoes. I would recommend these to anyone who enjoys walking.
customer_reviews.author: Webhead

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable fit as expected. Great stability and grip. Overall great shoe for golf.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Liked everything about the shoe, the most comfortable golf shoe that I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Ron King

customer_reviews.title: Ecco makes the most comfortable golf shoe ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable golf shoes... period. I’d wear them everywhere if my wife didn’t scold me for doing so. This is my 6th pair of the Biom line, and I love them. Well worth the $$$ I walked 18holes on the first wear, no issues whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Green

customer_reviews.title: Color. material
customer_reviews.text: Main point is gore-tex, and soft type's skin(outside). Outside upper skin's color is lighter than picture. I think it is similar to Kahki.
customer_reviews.author: cosmoskr

customer_reviews.title: You'll start walking the course again with thses shoes
customer_reviews.text: great golf shoes. extremely comfortable. fit perfectly. arrived as expected. Get 'em - you'll start walking the course again instead of riding.
customer_reviews.author: No Pars

customer_reviews.title: Truly Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement pair as the original pair lasted 2+ years on every other day use. I wore out the soles and the yak leather uppers, but they never leaked. One of 6 pair of Ecco golf shoes I now own.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable Stable Spikeless Design
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and extremely well made. Fits as expected with lots of room in the toe. Very stable spikeless sole.
customer_reviews.author: Russell A.

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable golf shoe yet!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit and stability...easy to clean sole. Best shoe ever for comfort I have found.
customer_reviews.author: J. Shuck

customer_reviews.title: Keeps feet dry !
customer_reviews.text: Feet stay dry every round won’t buy anything else from now on
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are AMAZING! I tried these on last month while in ...
customer_reviews.text: These are AMAZING! I tried these on last month while in FL and fell in love with them. They are very comfortable and they feel like a feather.
customer_reviews.author: Robert R. Mowery

customer_reviews.title: Early review
customer_reviews.text: I have only worn the shoes for 1 weekend of golf so far. It was 5 rounds of golf over 3 days and these shoes were great. I was expecting to have sore feet from so much golf in a short time, but I didn't. I have never had a more comfortable pair of golf shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: The next golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoe, super comfortable and can wear right out of the box!!
customer_reviews.author: FM transmitter

customer_reviews.title: Best Golf Shoes Ever
customer_reviews.text: Very stable and comfortable. But they should be for this price.
customer_reviews.author: hundfschmidt

customer_reviews.title: Home Run!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a golfer.... he loves the fit, comfort and style!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Foreman

customer_reviews.title: Great feel
customer_reviews.text: Really fine and comfortable. No problems and hope they last for 13 years like my other ECCO's. At 73 I hope I outlast them!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tom R

customer_reviews.title: ECCO golf shoes are wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Great looking golf shoes. Fit is perfect (there are still people who wear size 14!)
customer_reviews.author: wayne3177

customer_reviews.title: Ecco makes an excellent shoe
customer_reviews.text: Ecco shoes are the best golf shoes I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: HUB

customer_reviews.title: Let down
customer_reviews.text: How can one Ecco shoe be so different in fit than another
customer_reviews.author: DAN

customer_reviews.title: shoes are the most comfortable of all
customer_reviews.text: shoes are the most comfortable of all, tried many of the others. I have other ECCO shoes, and all are simply the best. No need to quibble about the price if comfort and fit is what you are looking for. No issues with traction, Played 3 rounds with these and they are the best shoes that I've worn to golf in ever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best and must for Golf
customer_reviews.text: Best golf shoes ever, inside and out. Really comfortable and keep your feet dry but never get hot. Best shoe ever, a bit pricey but Ecco man now regardless of price.
customer_reviews.author: Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: My son’s new favorite golf shoe! He loves the feel and the comfort and the fact that they’re waterproof. Definitely going to buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette Brandt

customer_reviews.title: Makes a strange flipping sound like a flip flop
customer_reviews.text: The shoe makes a strange sound when u walk and thats quite irritating. Apart from that its quite comfortable to wear . Would not recommend it for golf
customer_reviews.author: sanjay kumar

customer_reviews.title: best golf shoe I have
customer_reviews.text: i have 8 pairs of golf shoes and these Ecco gore-tex shoes are the most comfortable ones I own.
customer_reviews.author: amherst oakham auto recycling

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I’m a walker and very picky about shoes and these are great. Wide toe box and super soft conforming leather. I usually have to do spikes but these grip well without them.
customer_reviews.author: bmilllllls

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: Product is great for walking and carrying clubs, easy on the feet and felt great after 18 rounds.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry swartz

customer_reviews.title: Man are these shoes comfortable out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Wow , went to Golf Galaxy and tried on 15 pairs of shoes. None met my needs. Since I carry, comfort is a priority. But I also value fit. As a 5 handicapper I can only say wow highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit-extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Best golf shoes I’ve ever bought and I’ve been golfing for 51 years. My feet love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Scott McLean

customer_reviews.title: Good Golf Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have only worn them once, but they did fit as expected and were very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald C. Ray

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit! ECCO remains my #1 shoe for work, play, and golf!
customer_reviews.author: Desert Diplomat

customer_reviews.title: Correct size.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great golf shoe. I walk 18 holes sometimes twice a week. However beware of sizing. I wear a 44 in all of my Ecco shoes but with this one only 43 is the correct size.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Patton

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but a little pricey, but what isn’t nowadays.
customer_reviews.text: Best golf shoes I’ve ever owned. Great fit and comfort. 2nd pair I’ve bought, one blue one white. Actually most comfortable shoe of any kind I own.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoes. I should be able to wear them right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: These are golf shoes. I like the comfort and that fact that they are waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Brasher

customer_reviews.title: great feel
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I put them on they fit like a glove. Very comfortable. The best golf shoes I have had since my last pair of Ecco's.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L. Condensa

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Soooooooo comfortable. Look great on and off the course. It could work as my only pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio D'Iorio

customer_reviews.title: A greate surprice
customer_reviews.text: What a Great surprice to use this shoes. I brouk my right foot four years ago, I have inside me 9 screws and to use a good pair of shoes is spetialy important. I thanks for the good Quality
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Castellano

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes I’ve ever had.
customer_reviews.text: Best golf shoes on the market. I walked in down pour for two days at Bandon Dunes and my feet never got wet.
customer_reviews.author: CKT

customer_reviews.title: Love them all
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned other Ecco golf shoes. Love them all, but these are my favorite. Amazingly light, but very supportive and stable. And they look great! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jay J.

product_meta.title: ECCO Men's Biom Hybrid 3 Gore-tex Golf Shoe
product_meta.description: Whether you are hitting an approach to the green, or going for a stroll after your round, you are sure to benefit from the BIOM Hybrid 3's innovative outsole, called ECCO Tri-Fi-Grip. With three different zones- one for stability, one for durability and another for rotation- the outsole assist you from back-swing to follow-through. Crafted with BIOM technology to encourage more natural walking motion and enable more power efficiency, as well as enhancing feeling and stability.
feature_bullets: GORE-TEX Waterproof technology combines optimized breathability & protection against the elements
BIOM NATURAL MOTION technology brings the player closer to the ground using an anatomical last
YAK leather uppers, extremely strong & lightweight for increased breathability and durability increased breathability and durability
ECCO Tri-Fi-Grip with three different zones - STABILITY, DURABILITY and ROTATIONAL SUPPORT
Anti-microbial Ortholite inlay sole for long-term cushioning and enhanced breathability, removable for extra-width option.
